antacid, Dr. Olupitan disclosed, neutralises the acid in the gullet; it also protects the gullet from acid rising from the stomach. The managing director of the company, Mr. George Thorpe in his welcome address said "Ster- ling Products Nigeria Pic. is the largest health care provider in Nigeria and that is the testimony to the quality of our products." Andrews antacid is a pleas- antly chewable tablet that dissolves fast in the mouth and can be taken anytime. Antacid is packed in safety, sealed in printed foil and the name Andrews is embossed on both sides of the tablets to make it fool proof against imitation. Unveiling the new product, Dr. Mrs. Mark Odu, the special guest of honour said, "I am sure this Andrews antacid is for me" A statement which confirmed the slogan for the yet to be run commercial of the product: "When you have that burning, peppery, sensation in your chest, it's heartburn For heartburn, Andrews Antacid works fast". antacid, Dr. Olupitan disclosed, neutralises the acid in the gullet; it also protects the gullet from acid rising from the stomach. The Civil Liberties Organisation [CLO] will on Saturday, 10 December make a public presentation of its book Annual Reports on Human Rights In Nigeria, 1993. Written by Ogaga Ifowodo, Head of CLO's State of Human Rights Projects, the 380-page-book will be presented at the CLO Headquarters, Mbonu Ojike Street, Surulere, Lagos. The car, white in colour was stolen at the early hours of Sunday November 20, 1994 along Alfa Ma Street, Agege. Superstar Whitney Houston cuddles up to hubby Bobby Brown, as they patch uptheir marriage with a third honeymoon. Superstar Whitney Houston cuddles up to hubby Bobby Brown, as they patch uptheir marriage with a third honeymoon.

They snuggled and smooched beside the pool as Whitney's body language sang out loud and clear. "I will always love you." The 31- year-old singer who is four months pregnant looked relaxed and happy. And the bitter bust- ups, over Bobby'salleged womanising, suddenly seemed a distant memory. In March, former New Edition star Bobby, 25, was arrested for throwing punches at Whitney in the swish Los Angeles hotel The Pennisula.
